comment: See ~ 19.12 . Could be labeled "exalimalex" for "'there exists for all' implies 'for all there exists'". (Contributed by BJ, 12-Aug-2023.) The proof should not rely on ~ df-nf or ~ df-bj-nnf , directly or indirectly. (Proof modification is discouraged.)
